unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhajea hea mhoineachem electricity bill shock diunk joxem asa! Fattlim pavtim, sumara bhair ₹2500 aslem, punn hea pavtim ₹4875 asa. Maka somzona kiteak itlem voddlem. Zanvchit Delhi-n zalleli heatwave-ak lagun hanvem AC chodd vaparlem, vo zanvchit 15/07-ak meter reading chukichem aslem. BSES-ak call korun complaint korunk zai; hem bekar asa. Consumption 550 units dakhoita, je fokot eka mhoineak khoob chodd dista. Mhojea padosheachem bill, toxench flat-an jiyetat, tanchem fokot 3000 Rs aslem. Kitem tori fishy asa!
normalised: Arre yaar, mhozo electricity bill hea mhoineak bhayanak aasa! Fattlim mhoineak, don hazaar panchshe rupiya aslem, punn hea pavtim char hazaar aathshe sattar panch rupiya aasa. Maka somzonam tem kiteak itlem vaddle. Zalear Delhi-nt ushnachya lharacho lagun hanv A-C chodd vaparlem, va panchdara july-cher meter reading chukichi astali. B-S-E-S k phone korun complain korpachi goroz asa; hem bekar aasa. Consumption panchshe panchvan unit dakaita, jem ekach mhoinyakha tsoodd dista. Mhojea bazarche flat-ant ravnareajache bill fakt tin hazaar rupiya aslem. Kitem tori gadbad asa!
